Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{3: 'Without Lee at our side, the squad scrambles to fend off the attackers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "These mechanoids... Aren't they the prototypes used in the performance troupe?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Hm... there's logos of the Nighter all over the place...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So this facility is somehow related to the Nighter?', 4: '1'}
{3: '...Sensing something wrong, I turn to find Pulao gone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: '...Sorry about this.', 4: '1'}
{3: '...That familiar binding sensation again.'}
{3: 'No point in testing its strength. This collar is probably like the ones in the past: uncrackable, unless with authorization.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: '...Now you just stay nice and still. If you move more than 2 meters away from me, the neurotoxin will be in you faster than you can say "ouch".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "...Judging from what the merchant told me, you'll rot from the inside out.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'This was the real reason you had us sheathe our weapons!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Sorry... I do not want to go against you all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'This is a backup data point designated by the boss. If I acquire the data, perhaps—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's no reason to hold 【kuroname】hostage!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Once my pals on the Nighter get the data, we'll give you back your Commandant. You can take everything else that's left, if you want.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'We may not need much, but we do need our boss back.', 4: '1'}
{2: "There's no need for this, Pulao.", 3: '31'}

{2: 'Pulao', 3: "【kuroname】... All that has happened was quite the coincidence, so I can't bring myself to trust you. If you're here for the boss' data... I have no choice but to go against you.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Activate proximity infrared comms)', 3: '33'}
{3: "I'll have to use Morse code... I'll set it to the Babylonia backup channel."}
{2: 'President Hassen would never go back on his word.', 3: '35'}
{3: "Lee raises his gun, pointing it straight at Pulao. Exactly what I was hoping he'd do."}

{3: "Taking advantage of Pulao's moment of hesitation, I leap onto her, and the two of us roll together into the adjoining room. At the same time, I press the mouth of an anti-materiel pistol against the back of her head."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'All you Babylonians ever do is play dirty!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory29.jpg'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Hey! Let me go!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Only if you promise to stop resisting.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Still, I'm not going to believe you no matter what you say.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I've decrypted the file block, but...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'All the files are empty. I tried to restore the log and was only able to recover two entries.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Data log: Year ■, Day ■. Excerpt from audio monitor... Tsk, AI backup files, huh? Not even the real thing. No way they're more interesting than the secrets of Ascnet."}
{3: "Data log: Year ■, Day ■. Excerpt from audio monitor... Miss Luna's wish is our command."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Looks like other "visitors" have come before we did.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Behind the squad, the Corrupted begin to sway and crumble. As the Punishing Virus ravages their bodies, they gradually lose control and can barely hang on to their weapons.'}
{2: 'So neither of us got what we wanted...', 3: '61'}
{2: 'Not us, not Pulao.', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "This data center should've been safe...How did they find this place?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nothing is safe forever.', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Do you mean...', 4: '2'}
{2: "It's not over yet.", 3: '72'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "As both parties are after the contents of the database, I believe it's best to make this a long-term mission.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'The Purifying Force will keep an eye out on groundside missions as well.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Uh, um, what... what should I say at a time like this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You don't need to say anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "After all, trust is not something that's built on words.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "...Fine! In that case, I'll join your search for the guys who took the data... for the greater good!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I did something bad, I'll admit. Sorry!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pulao twirls around and sets off towards the mechanoids from the performance troupe, here to pick her up.'}
{2: 'Hey, about this "collar".', 3: '92'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Oh, that? It doesn't! Actually! Work!", 4: '2'}
